commandPrefix.description: Your discord bot's prefix, if your not sure then set it to '/'.

ip.description: IP address of the Minecraft server you want to poll. Domains that redirect to IP addresses ('play.exampleserver.net') will also work.

port.description: Port number of the Minecraft server you want to poll, if your not sure set it to '25566'.

pingInterval.description: Frequency, in seconds, at which you want the bot to ping the server. If your not sure set it to '30'.

embedColor.description: The hex color code you prefer the bot's richEmbed messages to use. If your not sure set it to '7289DA'.
